alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 3:42PM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, except an inch or two in the Mid Hudson Valley. * WHERE...Western Rensselaer, Eastern Greene, Western Columbia, Eastern Ulster and Eastern Dutchess Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery traveling conditions due to slush and snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow will mix with rain at times early this evening, but precipitation will primarily fall as snow tonight. Snow rates may be around a half inch to an inch per hour tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer
